mapper.select: SELECT release_id as releaseId, create_date as createDate, modified_date as modifiedDate, build_number as buildNumber, verified FROM release_ WHERE release_.build_number = #{buildNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO release_(release_id, create_date, modified_date, build_number, verified) VALUES(#{releaseId}, #{createDate}, #{modifiedDate}, #{buildNumber}, #{verified})
